title: Crash immediately after logging into account
body:
# Problem

Simply crashes pretty much always, after selecting account and entering password

# Information

Device: OnePlus One
OS: LineageOS, rooted
build.display: bacon-userdebug 7.1.2 NJH47F 410d9b4f68
build.fingerprint: oneplus/bacon/A0001:6.0.1/MHC19Q/ZNH2KAS1KN:user/release-keys

logcat:
```
2-04 21:18:34.707 E/libc    (29507): Access denied finding property "persist.logd.timestamp"
12-04 21:18:34.707 F/libc    (29507): Fatal signal 11 (SIGSEGV), code 1, fault addr 0xbbadbeef in tid 29570 (mqt_js)
12-04 21:18:34.709 W/        (211): debuggerd: handling request: pid=29507 uid=10181 gid=10181 tid=29570
12-04 21:18:34.760 I/ActivityManager(862): Start proc 29601:nextapp.sp/u0a186 for service nextapp.sp/.monitor.MonitorService
12-04 21:18:34.860 F/DEBUG   (29600): *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** ***
12-04 21:18:34.860 F/DEBUG   (29600): LineageOS Version: '14.1-20171106-NIGHTLY-bacon'
12-04 21:18:34.861 F/DEBUG   (29600): Build fingerprint: 'oneplus/bacon/A0001:6.0.1/MHC19Q/ZNH2KAS1KN:user/release-keys'

12-04 21:18:34.861 F/DEBUG   (29600): ABI: 'arm'

12-04 21:18:34.861 F/DEBUG   (29600): signal 11 (SIGSEGV), code 1 (SEGV_MAPERR), fault addr 0xbbadbeef
12-04 21:18:34.861 F/DEBUG   (29600):     r0 5b60d294  r1 fffffffe  r2 bbadbeef  r3 00000000
12-04 21:18:34.861 F/DEBUG   (29600):     r4 ffffffff  r5 0001f000  r6 0000ffff  r7 00010000
12-04 21:18:34.861 F/DEBUG   (29600):     r8 00010000  r9 0001f000  sl 00000001  fp 00000000
12-04 21:18:34.861 F/DEBUG   (29600):     ip b47875fc  sp 5b60d318  lr 7c05ed67  pc 7c05ed9c  cpsr 400e0030
12-04 21:18:34.862 F/DEBUG   (29600): 
12-04 21:18:34.862 F/DEBUG   (29600): backtrace:
12-04 21:18:34.863 F/DEBUG   (29600):     #00 pc 00142d9c  /data/app/im.status.ethereum-2/lib/arm/libjsc.so (offset 0x40000)
12-04 21:18:34.863 F/DEBUG   (29600):     #01 pc 00142d63  /data/app/im.status.ethereum-2/lib/arm/libjsc.so (offset 0x40000)
12-04 21:18:34.868 I/art     (29601): Starting a blocking GC AddRemoveAppImageSpace
12-04 21:18:35.666 W/        (211): debuggerd: resuming target 29507
12-04 21:18:35.695 W/ActivityManager(862):   Force finishing activity im.status.ethereum/.MainActivity
12-04 21:18:35.714 I/BootReceiver(862): Copying /data/tombstones/tombstone_01 to DropBox (SYSTEM_TOMBSTONE)
12-04 21:18:35.727 I/WindowManager(862): WIN DEATH: Window{4d8bd11 u0 im.status.ethereum/im.status.ethereum.MainActivity}
12-04 21:18:35.727 I/qti_sensors_hal(862): LIS3DH Accelerometer: batch  15.00    inf
12-04 21:18:35.729 I/ActivityManager(862): Process im.status.ethereum (pid 29507) has died
12-04 21:18:35.731 I/WindowManager(862): WIN DEATH: Window{afb194d u0 im.status.ethereum/im.status.ethereum.MainActivity}
12-04 21:18:35.731 W/ActivityManager(862): Scheduling restart of crashed service im.status.ethereum/.module.StatusService in 1000ms
12-04 21:18:35.772 I/Zygote  (268): Process 29507 exited due to signal (11)
12-04 21:18:35.803 I/OpenGLRenderer(862): Initialized EGL, version 1.4
12-04 21:18:36.770 I/ActivityManager(862): Start proc 29651:im.status.ethereum/u0a181 for service im.status.ethereum/.module.StatusService
12-04 21:18:36.780 W/ActivityManager(862): Ignoring remove of inactive process: ProcessRecord{38e399e 0:im.status.ethereum/u0a181}
12-04 21:18:36.800 W/InputEventReceiver(862): Attempted to finish an input event but the input event receiver has already been disposed.
12-04 21:18:36.826 E/FullInputEventModel(2527): onStartInput event aborted: com.touchtype.keyboard.g.q: could not obtain extracted text (class 
```

Originally reported at https://github.com/status-im/status-go/issues/502#issuecomment-349602231
Seems like it's related to react-native: facebook/react-native#10756

Still apparently the same thing happens on latest version of Status. Here's a full crash report
[tombstone_08.txt](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/files/1751969/tombstone_08.txt)
